cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 2800, Working to Integrate Networks Guaranteeing Member Access Now Act

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 70 (Thursday, April 22, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. PERRY:
H.R. 2800.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section VIII of the U.S. Constitution
[Page H2109]

latestAction.text: Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.

title: WINGMAN Act
